projects.title: Upwork-Freelancer
projects.description: Upwork-Freelancer , I started to take on freelance projects to gain experience and build my portfolio, I have worked on a variety of projects, including web development, mobile app development, and software development, as you can see my skills are diverse and I am always looking to learn and grow. My many positive reviews and feedback from my clients are a testament to my dedication and commitment to delivering high-quality work.

projects.title: Bus Tracker
projects.description: Proficient Angular and TypeScript developer with hands-on experience building dynamic web applications. Demonstrated ability to leverage APIs and implement real-time data visualization through the creation of a bus tracking website. Skilled in developing responsive and user-friendly interfaces, managing application state, and ensuring efficient data handling within the Angular framework. Adept at utilizing TypeScript for robust and maintainable code.

projects.title: SharePoint Web Part Expert
projects.description: Aspiring SPFx developer with a solid understanding of TypeScript, React, and the SharePoint Framework. Demonstrated ability to build custom web parts and extensions through personal projects and training. Eager to apply my knowledge and contribute to a team focused on developing innovative solutions for SharePoint Online. Quick learner with a passion for modern web technologies and Microsoft 365.
